message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, $15,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  This is a fair price for both of us, as it's still a decent profit for you and within my budget.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Alice, $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500.  This is a fair compromise that allows us both to get a good deal.
